TopicTitle: What's the maxium number of threads KSP can use?

Articles.Content:
What's the maxium number of threads KSP can use?

I'm considering built a new PC, maybe with 10+cores and 20threads.  Can KSP use it well?

Hi @edmondhk, KSP is made in the Unity3D game engine which uses Nvidias PhysX for multi-threaded physics, see here for more.

Multi-threading is handled automatically, so PhysX may not use all your threads all of the time.
